data.eml:eml: New species and new records of the genus Deinopteroloma Jansson, 1946 (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Omaliinae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cheng, Zhi-Fei, Tang, Liang, Li, Li-Zhen, Peng, Zhong (2019): New species and new records of the genus Deinopteroloma Jansson, 1946 (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Omaliinae) from China. ZooKeys 846: 55-64, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.846.32568, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.846.32568
